00012 namespace sevent
00013 {
00014     namespace serialize
00015     {
00016         typedef boost::archive::text_iarchive iarchive_t;
00017         typedef boost::archive::text_oarchive oarchive_t;
00018 
00019         template<typename T>
00020         struct BoostSerialize
00021         {
00022             typedef T value_type;
00023             typedef boost::shared_ptr<value_type> value_ptr;
00024 
00025             static serialize::BaseResult_ptr serialize(boost::any& data)
00026             {
00027                 value_ptr dataCast = boost::any_cast<value_ptr>(data);
00028                 std::stringstream stream;
00029                 oarchive_t oa(stream);
00030                 oa << *dataCast;
00031                 return boost::make_shared<serialize::StringResult>(stream.str());
00032             }
00033 
00034             static boost::any deserialize(datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr serialized)
00035             {
00036                 value_ptr out = boost::make_shared<value_type>();
00037                 std::stringstream stream;
00038                 stream << serialized->data;
00039                 iarchive_t ia(stream);
00040                 ia >> *out;
00041                 return out;
00042             }
00043         };
00044 
00045         template<typename T>
00046         struct Boost: Pair
00047         {
00048             typedef T value_type;
00049             Boost() : Pair(BoostSerialize<value_type>::serialize,
00050                                BoostSerialize<value_type>::deserialize)
00051             {}
00052         };
00053     } // namespace serialize
00054 } // namespace sevent
